captions.text:
Ronaldo. Ronaldo? Yes Ronaldo. So that's one
for Ronaldo.
Ronaldo. Ronaldo. Cristiano Ronaldo.

He's looking hot. Strong - he's looking strong!
What about Messi? Messi is little!

Messi's a bit short but he might be bigger in some
places? I mean I don't think so. No - ok...

Him. The one on the left why not the one on
the right? Because he looks like a bit of

a-- Ok! No, he looks like a bit of a what?
A bit of a pr*ck. There we go! The guy on

the right looks like he plucks his eyebrows
so I'm gonna go with the guy on the left.

You're gonna go for Lionel Messi. So if Ronaldo
was gonna take you out on a date - would he

take you out for a very posh meal - or would
he just take you out to Nando's or something

and then just wanna get you back home? Erm
I'm imagining a sort of posher version of

the Nando's storyline. Ok, so like a Zizzi's
or something? Maybe. Probably somewhere posh.

Maybe a nice one? Nice restaurant somewhere
expensive. Some kind of activity? Like mini-golf?

Do you think he'd try it on with you on the
first date? Yeah for sure. Probably. Yes.

How do you think Ronaldo would fare in bed?
I think - I think he'd think he was too much

but I don't think he would be. So you think
when he took his pants down there wouldn't

be much there? Na. No? She thinks Ronaldo's
got a small penis. I reckon he's pretty selfish

as well. He's a selfish lover, see. So why
would you go with Ronaldo?
See I'm changing my mind now!
Oh god I feel so awkward!
So Messi's pulled his pants down yeah? On our first date after mini-golf? Yeah!
So thinking about it you'd rather go with Messi who's the sensitive lover. Yep, that's Messi.

Who's better looking? Who's better looking?
Him or him? Who would you rather date?

Not a fan of neither Messi or
Ronaldo...
